document_data.name: Maddgoth's Castle
document_data.mainbody: '''Maddgoth's Castle''' was the seventh level of [[Undermountain]]. It was named after a miniature, 1:12-scale fortress in one of its caverns. The castle served as a base of operations for a serial killer called [[Maddgoth]], who specialized in bringing home [[wizards]] and killing them. He was known to be very old, although it was unclear if he was an [[archmage]] who had prolonged his life with ''[[potions of longevity]]'' or a [[lich]]. Anyone who entered the castle shrank to one-twelfth their normal size.

Geography.Exits:
The following ways could be used to leave this level:
* A tunnel in the south-east corner of the level led to level 8, [[Slitherswamp]].
* A tunnel in the north-west corner of this level led to level 6, the [[Lost Level]].
* An archgate in a storeroom led to level 9, [[Dweomercore]].
* A mirror gate to level 10, [[Murial's Gauntlet]].{{Fact}}

Inhabitants.Stone Giants: ''Circa'' [[1483 DR]], [[Halaster Blackcloak]] lured a family of [[stone giant]]s, and cursed them to remember nothing of their past lives and even anything that had happened over eight hours previously. They were unaware of the castle.
Inhabitants.[[Otto (dragon)|Otto]] the [[Faerie drag: A violet faerie dragon named Otto was drawn here by Halaster Blackcloak's [[magic]]. Upon its discovery of the tiny castle, it moved in, and never shrank, although it was still fairly comfortable inside.
